name: NVIDIA GeForce RTX 5090
description: The ultimate gaming GPU featuring 32GB GDDR7 memory, Blackwell architecture, and DLSS 4.0 with AI frame generation. Delivers unprecedented 8K gaming performance with next-gen ray tracing.

reviews.review_text: Absolutely insane performance. 8K gaming is finally real.
DLSS 4.0 frame gen is witchcraft. 240fps in Cyberpunk.
Expensive but if you want the best, this is it.
